availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Arnold Snider (Greenup County, KY, farmer and soldier)

body.p: Greenup County, Kentucky, resident. Kentucky native. Son of James Snider and Mary A. Snider. Resident of Lewis County, Kentucky, in 1850. Resident of Greenup County in 1860. Tried for manslaughter in the Greenup Circuit Court in July 1862 for the killing of James Briggs in Greenup County. Served in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Mounted Infantry as a private from September 3, 1864 to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
